review: In 2013, producer Almir Listo wrote that 'We've made it clear that Payday 2 will have no microtransactions whatsoever (shame on you if you thought otherwise!)' -- LIAR and ♥♥♥♥ you very much!
Not Good... Just not good :( ... I wanted so much more but weeks and still no crash fix and the hype.. I will leave that alone. I like to give all games a fair go but this is just sad.
